main event: Two men observed an unidentified flying object approximately 35-40 feet in diameter, which hovered silently about 30 feet above the ground before rapidly accelerating and disappearing.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on July 3, 1959, around 7:15 PM., The object made no noise during the observation., It was reported to have a height of about 20 feet., Investigations from various local airports confirmed no aircraft present in the area at the time., The incident was reported by members of the Fairborne Plant Protection Group.
witness description: members of the Fairborne Plant Protection Group
